problem_text_cn: 如图,河坝横断面的迎水坡AB的坡比为3:4,BC=6m,则坡面AB的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a trolley drives up N_0 along a slope with an inclination angle of α, and it is known that sinα = \frac{N_1}{N_2}, then the ascent height of the trolley is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵河坝横断面的迎水坡AB的坡比为3:4,BC=6m,∴\frac{BC}{AC}=\frac{3}{4},即\frac{\hat{6}}{AC}=\frac{3}{4},解得:AC=8．故AB=√{BC^{2}+AC^{2}}=√{6^{2}+8^{2}}=10(m)．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了解直角三角形的应用,正确掌握坡度的定义是解题关键
